property.name: mdpc.descrs
property.value: Convert raw e-mail files to PDF

project.property: This software can be used to convert eml files (emails as plain text in MIME format) to pdf files. It can be used as a library, command line tool or desktop application with its GUI. . The conversion is done by parsing (and cleaning) the mime/structure, converting it to html and then using wkhtmltopdf to convert the generated html to a pdf file. . It also handles inline images, corrupt mime headers and can use a proxy.
